GiftMeal.FirstHeader: Give the gift of great food to your friends or teams at work
GiftMeal.SendGiftParagraph: We listened to your requests and launched elmenus GiftMeals, a simple way for you to share promos with friends or teams at work so everyone can enjoy great food wherever they are.
GiftMeal.SecondHeader: Bring Happiness To Your Team or to your Friends
GiftMeal.GiftAccParagraph: Set your budget for each GiftMeal (e.g. 10 EGP) and select how many GiftMeals you would like to buy.
GiftMeal.ListYourFriendsDetails: Easily copy & paste phone numbers to send multiple GiftMeals to your teams and friends.
GiftMeal.Pay the full amount online Details: Once you purchase the GiftMeals, you'll receive a confirmation email and your friends/teams will receive an SMS with the GiftMeal promo code.
GiftMeal.They receive the GiftMeals Details: The people you gifted can use their personalized GiftMeal promo code via their associated phone number to order great dishes on elmenus.

Home.send great Food: Send great food to your friends or teams at work
Home.Get food delivered from amazing restaura: Get food delivered from amazing restaurants around you
Home.Browse restaurants by mood, cuisine, are: Browse restaurants by mood, cuisine, area or dish
Home.orderStatus: Want to know your order status? No problem, Now you can know exactly where your order is throughout the delivery process
Home.No Phone Calls Pargraph: Order your favorite food easier, faster, and without phone calls.
Home.Look for restaurants that have this sign: Look for restaurants that have this sign
